sentences.sContent: We got there early but Mike had already left.
sentences.sCn: 我们及早到了那里，但是迈克已经离开了。

sentences.sContent: ...I'd like to relive a period I've already lived – the 1960s...
...Your identity has been formed; you’ve built up your resources; and now you have the chance to take the big risks precisely because your foundation is already secure...
...I like in-class exams because the time is already reserved...
...I have already sweated through numerous in-class midterms and finals...
...Some robots are already programmed with basic human values...
...there is a student talking to his father with the words that “Why am I going to school if my phone already knows everything...
...The burger business faces more pressure from regulators at a time when it is already adapting strategies in response to shifts in the global economy...
...based on the number of places in an area that already sell alcohol...

trans.tranOther: before now or before a particular time in the pas
